participant_1.background: i have blonde hair and blue eyes. i recently got an apartment with my best friend. i work at a bar at night to pay for college. i do not like chicken.

participant_2.background: i love to go to disney world every year. mickey mouse is my favorite character. i play with my friends on the playground. i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i am in the third grade.

content.text: hello, how is your night going? i work nights at a bar.
it is going well, thank you. what about yours?
